lead_paragraph: BERLIN, April 30 (From German broadcasts recorded by The Associated Press) -- The German High Command said today that Soviet troops had "succeeded in breaking through our positions" at the outskirts of a large locality, but had been thrown back by a counter-attack.
abstract: Germans admit USSR break-through, southern sector
